page.title: 03LAW & ORDER.LYNEMOUTH.
page.content: {The Policeman.} The community policeman for our area is P.C. Colin Summerscales. He is based at Broomhill Police Station along with six other policeman. {Crime.} So far this year there has been no real increase in crime. The main crimes in this area are burglaries which can be split into two main groups, dwellings and taking without consent. We do not get any serious crime in this area most people are law abiding especially the older people. It is mainly the younger people who carry out the crimes. {Theft.} Because of the fact that there is not enough policeman in the area it is difficult to keep thefts under control.
